item.title: Building an MCP Server for OpenDota API with FastMCP
item.description:
Introduction Link to heading

I recently built a showcase project that demonstrates how to transform any OpenAPI-compliant REST API into a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server using FastMCP. The result is opendotamcp, an MCP server that wraps the OpenDota API and can be deployed both locally and remotely via AWS Lambda + API Gateway.

This project serves as both a practical tool for AI agents to access Dota 2 statistics and a reference implementation for anyone looking to build production-ready MCP servers.
